articles.author: Jamie Klein
articles.title: Le Mans 24h, H21: Ferrari locked in tense battle with Toyota - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Ferrari and Toyota were locked in a tense battle for honours in the centenary running of the Le Mans 24 Hours with three hours of running left.
articles.content: The race for the overall win took a fresh twist in the 19th hour when the leading #51 Ferrari 499P failed to get away immediately after its pitstop as Antonio Giovinazzi handed over to Alessandro Pie… [+3029 chars]

articles.title: Romelu Lukaku SLAMMED by fans after Champions League defeat to Man City - Daily Mail
articles.description: Romelu Lukaku has been heavily criticised online after a poor performance for Inter Milan in the Champions League final.
articles.content:
